body_html: I'd say that messing with *Impl is clearly not recommended, as they aren't part of the public API. Also I don't think we should make .get() do any checks, because it's used all over the place and there's little point in doing that. We might just want to make Variables not default constructible. You should always use make_variable
body_text: I'd say that messing with *Impl is clearly not recommended, as they aren't part of the public API. Also I don't think we should make .get() do any checks, because it's used all over the place and there's little point in doing that. We might just want to make Variables not default constructible. You should always use make_variable
body: I'd say that messing with `*Impl` is clearly not recommended, as they aren't part of the public API. Also I don't think we should make `.get()` do any checks, because it's used all over the place and there's little point in doing that. We might just want to make Variables not default constructible. You should always use `make_variable`
